propList.Name: current
propList.Description: To set the current step, counting from 0. You can overwrite this state by using status of Step

propList.Name: direction
propList.Description: To specify the direction of the step bar, horizontal or vertical

propList.Name: initial
propList.Description: Set the initial step, counting from 0

propList.Name: labelPlacement
propList.Description: Place title and description with horizontal or vertical direction

propList.Name: percent
propList.Description: Progress circle percentage of current step in process status (only works on basic Steps)

propList.Name: progressDot
propList.Description: Steps with progress dot style, customize the progress dot by setting it to a function. labelPlacement will be vertical

propList.Name: responsive
propList.Description: Change to vertical direction when screen width smaller than 532px

propList.Name: size
propList.Description: To specify the size of the step bar, default and small are currently supported

propList.Name: status
propList.Description: To specify the status of current step, can be set to one of the following values: wait process finish error

propList.Name: type
propList.Description: Type of steps, can be set to one of the following values: default, navigation
